newsitem.title: SWEDEN: SCA cargo ship damaged in crash with ship.
newsitem.headline: SCA cargo ship damaged in crash with ship.

text.p: Swedish forestry company SCA's graphic paper unit said on Monday that one of its roll-on/roll-off ships, the M/S Ostrand, had collided with another vessel, the Star Frazer, outside Rotterdam.
"No people were injured in the accident, but the collision was powerful and caused appreciable damage to both vessels," SCA said in a statement.
The cause of the accident on Sunday evening will be investigated, SCA said.
The M/S Ostrand, which has a dead weight of 8,670 tonnes, will be out of operation for up to 14 days for repairs.
"SCA Transforest will arrange for transportation of paper and pulp with temporary rented resources, so deliveries to customers will not be affected," SCA said.
The ship was travelling from Rotterdam to Sweden.
